ModMetaData.name: [CP] Rimmu-Nation - Gloves N' Boots
ModMetaData.author: Chicken Plucker
ModMetaData.description:
How you run 10 miles everyday without our selection of footwear?
Hold your firearm with a set of tacticool gloves, Rimmu-Nation has NEW STOCKS of handwear and footwear!
RIMMU-NATION, DEFENDING YOUR RIGHTS.
